channel.title: Client Problem Help please. :)
channel.description:
I get this when i do 2 clicks on this client...
[code]OutPacket 121 Loading new areas ----------------------------- ----------------------------- OutPacket 130 Trade Window clicking ----------------------------- ----------------------------- OutPacket 164 Main Screen Walking Number of Steps: 1 ----------------------------- ----------------------------- OutPacket 164 Main Screen Walking Number of Steps: 1 ----------------------------- # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d847786, pid=19012, tid=19976 # # JRE version: 6.0_21-b06 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (17.0-b16 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x57786] # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Users\Mary\Desktop\Bombs Cheat Client\hs_err_pid19012.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
so im not rlly sure what to do since i have downloaded both java's for windows vista 64 and 32... and I was told my problem was in the run.bat but there is nothign to edit since it only shows this....
[code]@echo off java -Xmx512m -jar Release.jar pause[/code] My opertating System is Windows vista 64 bit. And ill be very happy if you guys could give me a solution since i can find a fixing tut.

item.title: Client Problem Help please. :)
item.dc:creator: @badboy1871 badboy1871
item.description:
@badboy1871 wrote:

I get this when i do 2 clicks on this client…

[code]OutPacket 121
Loading new areas

OutPacket 130
Trade Window clicking

OutPacket 164
Main Screen Walking
Number of Steps: 1

OutPacket 164
Main Screen Walking
Number of Steps: 1

A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:

EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d847786, pid=19012,

tid=19976

JRE version: 6.0_21-b06

Java VM: Java HotSpot™ 64-Bit Server VM (17.0-b16 mixed mode windows-amd64

)

Problematic frame:

V [jvm.dll+0x57786]

An error report file with more information is saved as:

C:\Users\Mary\Desktop\Bombs Cheat Client\hs_err_pid19012.log

If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:

http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp

Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

so im not rlly sure what to do since i have downloaded both java’s for windows vista 64 and 32… and I was told my problem was in the run.bat but there is nothign to edit since it only shows this…

@echo off java -Xmx512m -jar Release.jar pause
My opertating System is Windows vista 64 bit.
And ill be very happy if you guys could give me a solution since i can find a fixing tut.
